tiers.name: Mining Speed I
tiers.description: Increases the mining speed of the Quarry

tiers.name: Auto Output
tiers.description: Auto Outputs items to adjacent inventories

tiers.name: Redstone Control
tiers.description: Apply a redstone signal to disable the quarry

tiers.name: Silk Touch
tiers.description: Applies Silk Touch to the blocks the quarry mines

tiers.name: Fortune I
tiers.description: Applies Fortune I to the blocks the quarry mines

tiers.name: Trash Filter I
tiers.description: Adds 1 row of trash filter slots

tiers.name: Chunkloading
tiers.description: Keeps the chunks the quarry is mining loaded

subtext.text:
NOTE: Will only tick the chunk that the quarry block is in.
Make sure to keep your power generation is in the same chunk.
